description: Play the given piece of music.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: music
description: The piece to play. Must be a valid sound alias.

params.name: timescale
description: Whether this music is effected by timescale changes.

params.name: overrideCheat
description: Certain player cheats can disable this function, set this true to force the issue.
